title: Safecracker Evelynn graphical bug?
body:
Her leather bodysuit used to be shiny but now there are some weird reddish-black spots where it was supposed to shine:

http://img.overpic.net/images/u/u/l/xuuleqie8bvl7h353u08.png

At first I thought it was because I was playing on Linux but she looks exactly the same while I'm playing on Windows.

Is this a graphical bug? I hate how she looks...

replies.body:
Hey Janne Dulk! 

Yikes, thanks for the report! It's definitely not Linux, I was able to repro this on the first try. We'll take a look and see what's going on with her texture. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mPMvmLXW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-24T18:45:18.835+0000)
>
> Hey Janne Dulk! 
> 
> Yikes, thanks for the report! It's definitely not Linux, I was able to repro this on the first try. We'll take a look and see what's going on with her texture. ^-^

Hello, Could you please fix this bug too? It happens quite often to some players. I think it has to do something with Braum. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aFp35LSJajM

From the looks of this, there isn't a solid repro - would you have more information around it? There are a ton of variables in a team fight, so that clip isn't the best example. Do you have any leads on how it may have to relate to Braum?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mPMvmLXW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-25T00:12:31.151+0000)
>
> From the looks of this, there isn't a solid repro - would you have more information around it? There are a ton of variables in a team fight, so that clip isn't the best example. Do you have any leads on how it may have to relate to Braum?

Here's another bug report thread (with video)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/u1cdBiR5-evelynn-q-with-7-seconds-cooldown-shown-in-video

I think it has to do with ulting Braum + allies while his shield is up. Generally from what I have seen, you open with ult and W and hit Braum AND allies with your ult (while Braum's shield is up), and then while your ult shield is up and your W is on cooldown (I would test it while you still have the W active buff as well) you Q and E Braum (who has his shield up) and your Q will go on a super long cooldown. The videos aren't clear, your Q MAY have to hit Braum and pierce through him to also hit his ally (if that's even possible?).

The bug has been around for months anyway. If Eve + Braum were high pick/ban in the LCS it would definitely happen in an LCS game and the game would need to be restarted.
Ahhh, thank you! Much appreciated. Going to talk to some gameplay friends and see if they can help me nail this down. ^-^

This is pretty late, but I can add to this, that I have tried to reproduce this bug with Evelynn against Braum + 1 ally, but all of the videos that show the bug has multiple allies around Braum, so my guess would be that there needs to be at least 2 people around Braum for this bug to happen.
**UPDATE:** Compiled all of this into an email, and shot it over to Gameplay to take a look at.
After many patches, she still looks the same. :(

I find Evelynn's Ult in this skin, likes to say it's off cooldown, but it's not sometimes do you suppose it's related ?
I also find that in some Skins there are times where my E animation goes off but no damage occurs and the Skill doesn't go on cooldown -_-
